items: Company Annual Account and Ellipro Survey
comments: Address proof exists with valid document (Utility Bill).
Annual accounts for 2022, 2021, and 2020 are available with Ellipro scores.
Bank details and postal code are available and verified.
Headquarters address is available and matches the registered address.
Jurisdiction information is available and verified (Great Britain).
Compliance for AML and Data Protection is validated, others are under review.
Business scope verification is complete, reflecting robust and diverse operations.
No PEP screening matches or related documentation issues were found.
Record revenue of 158.1 billion dollars and managed revenue of 162.4 billion dollars reported.
Market capitalization is reported at 489,320 million dollars.
